snippet.title: The Fantastic Rainy Day Book
snippet.description: A collection of sixty entertaining projects offers educational diversion away from the television set and includes step-by-step instructions for such ideas as baking muffins, building a puppet theater, and growing flower bulbs.

snippet.description: Includes such activities as connecting-the-dots, making holiday decorations and cards, coloring, and making paper models.

snippet.title: Rainy Day Play: Explore, Create, Discover, Pretend
snippet.description: Collects over seventy rainy day activities that encourage children to explore science, music, cooking, crafts, and dramatic play. By the author of Sunny Days and Starry Nights. Reprint.

snippet.description: Presents handmade projects that are thematically arranged for seasons and holidays and do not require advanced skills or sophisticated crafting tools.
